arts.ttl: Monday's Transfer Talk Update: Patrick Dorgu, Matheus Cunha, Alvaro Fernandez
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Arsenal's stubborn defence nullified Matheus Cunha, writes ISAAN KHAN - but Wolves talisman showed enough to tempt the Gunners this month
arts.sum: ISAAN KHAN AT MOLINEUX: Upon the hour mark Matheus Cunha had lashed a strike from outside the box, leaving David Raya to spur into life, pawing the ball away at full stretch.

arts.ttl: Matheus Cunha ‘not for sale’ amid Arsenal and Forest transfer interest
arts.sum: Matheus Cunha won’t be sold in the January transfer window despite being linked with moves to Arsenal and Nottingham Forest, Wolves boss Vitor Pereira has said. The Brazil international has been a standout performer on a poor Wanderers team this season, recording 10 goals and four assists in 21 Premier League appearances. The Midlands outfit […] The post Matheus Cunha ‘not for sale’ amid Arsenal and Forest transfer interest first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Arsenal risk another painful transfer reminder as Matheus Cunha looks to prove point for Wolves
arts.sum: Alexander Isak showed Arsenal what they are missing and Cunha could do the same at Molineux this afternoon

arts.ttl: Preview: Braga vs. Boavista - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Primeira Liga clash between Braga and Boavista, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Report: Aston Villa make shock entry into Matheus Cunha race as Unai Emery looks to hijack transfer
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers forward Matheus Cunha is attracting significant interest from Premier League clubs, with clubs such as Manchester United, Chelsea, and Arsenal credited with an interest. But now it’s thought that Aston Villa becoming the latest side to monitor the Brazilian’s situation at the Midlands rivals – even though they are well-stocked in attack.
